task.title: Connect the Hot Wires
task.shortdesc: Joining and soldering the hot wires to the pots and output jack.

step.cmd: Twist together the stripped ends of the cut red wires, leaving the other ends separate.

substep.cmd: Solder the twisted end to Lug 2 of the volume pot.
Solder one of the separate ends to Lug 1 of the tone pot.
Solder the other separate end to the Tip of the output jack.
substep.info: The Tip of the output jack is the smaller outer-most lug

image.alt: Wiring diagram showing the volume pot hot wire connections
